name: getZRLocationStructure
description:
Get the [location hierarchial structure(s)](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/115000342983-Zoom-Rooms-Location-Hierarchy) applied on the Zoom Rooms in an account.

**Prerequisites:**
* Zoom Rooms version 4.0 or higher * Account owner or admin permissions
**Scopes:** `room:read:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

$ul: **structures**: Hierarchial structure array of the Zoom Rooms location.
